bio: Marta Bevacqua is an Italian photographer who is known for her artistic, dreamlike images. She has worked on a variety of projects, including editorial and commercial assignments, and her work has been exhibited in galleries and featured in publications around the world. Bevacqua is known for her use of color and light, and her ability to create ethereal, otherworldly images that capture the imagination. She has received numerous awards and accolades for her work, and is highly regarded within the photography community.
